title: Looking for a Ranked 5's Jungler and ADC (For an already existing SERIOUS Ranked 5's team)
body:
Reuirements: 
- You must be available for 3 practice games a week (Lots of free time is desirable.)
- You must be willing to play 3 practice draft games a week (Do not tryout if you are not willing to practice!)
- You must have a rank in the Gold - Plat range.
- You must have Skype and a mic.
- You must be willing to listen to the shot caller. (Shot caller is subject to change if a better one comes along. Obviously you can suggest ideas and map movements in game, but the shot caller has final say.)

Add SwordArtist in game. Upon adding me, please immediately message me your Skype username, and I will try you out with the Team manager to evaluate your eligibility.
 P.S You must message me your availability to see if it coincides with the team schedule before you tryout!

replies.body: added you and you seem to have added me back but you are offline?
